SEARCH
Package src.model

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
src.model.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents an enquiry made by an applicant about a project. Includes content, status, project info, and reply history.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(int enquiryId, String content, String status, String applicantNric, String applicantName, String projectName)
      Constructs a new enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - Unique ID for the enquiry.
      content - Initial enquiry message.
      status - Status of the enquiry (e.g., "OPEN", "CLOSED").
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant.
      applicantName - Full name of the applicant.
      projectName - Project the enquiry is related to.

  • Method Details

    • addReply

      public void addReply(String content, User responder)
      Adds a reply to the enquiry and closes the enquiry automatically.
      Parameters:
      content - The reply message.
      responder - The user responding (officer or manager).

    • addReply

      public void addReply(EnquiryReply reply)
      Adds an already-created reply and closes the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      reply - A reply object.

    • editContent

      public void editContent(String newContent)
      Edits the enquiry content.
      Parameters:
      newContent - The updated enquiry text.

    • delete

      public void delete()
      Marks the enquiry as deleted, clears content and replies.

    • close

      public void close()
      Marks the enquiry as closed.

    • getFormattedReplies

      public String getFormattedReplies()
      Returns a pipe-delimited string of all replies in formatted text.
      Returns:
      Combined replies for display or export.
